about_the_game:
More game content can be followed: Bilibili Wei Zeteng

Game Introduction:

#This first person shooter horror cooperative action game will lead players through the city and go through five long battles along the way.
#Players will play as one of the survivors, a classic and advanced weapon.
#Terrifying new special infections, testing the power of these weapons, and encountering five "unusual" ordinary infections. Brand new survivors. A brand new story. Brand new dialogue. Unusual ordinary infected individuals. Each of the five new campaigns has at least one type of "unusual" common infection exclusive to that campaign.
#This is a level crossing FPS shooting zombie game
#This game is a first person action adventure shooting game with a zombie theme, integrating elements such as first person shooting and fighting zombies, with extremely high degrees of freedom. In the game, players are in a world plagued by zombies. By collecting gem resources, purchasing character attributes, and using various weapons to continuously eliminate zombies, they try their best to survive.

Introduction to Game Development Background:

#This is a free FPS game developed for tutorials
#This game will be updated and fixed gradually with the tutorial
#This game is a teaching case of Bilibili Wei Zeteng, not an official game
#If there is something that everyone doesn't like, please don't give a negative review. Thank you all on your knees
#If you want to learn UE5 Blueprint game development and production, you can follow Bilibili Wei Zeteng

Kneel down and thank all the masters for their support~

name: T-深渊病毒:起源

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4代
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 可在720p/60fps的情况下进行游戏
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: ntel i7 7代
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 可在1080p/60fps的情况下进行游戏

short_description: This game is a first person shooting game with a zombie theme, integrating elements such as first person shooting and fighting zombies. In the game, players are in a world plagued by zombies, collecting gem resources, purchasing attributes, and using weapons to eliminate zombies.
